name: Shadows of Yesterday
description:
The University of Alberta's Certificate in Computer Game Development begins with CMPUT250, where students get into interdisciplinary teams to create a 30 minute video game in RPGMakerMV. My team - The Glitter Party - created a story-focused bullet hell with psychological themes.

Dodge to fuel your ego or destroy your enemies to fuel your id, the consequences of your choices follow you to the end.

Producer, Artist - Justine Bendico (me)

Programmers - Simon Humphrey (lead) , Mohit Kumar

Writer - Rosalind Fleischer-Brown

Music - Richard Qin

EP - Hope Docking
